title: The nature and usefulness of solemn judicial swearing with the impiety and mischief of vain and false-swearing in a sermon preached July 14th, 1681, in the cathedral church of S. Peter in York at the assizes for that county / by Thomas Comber.
author: Comber, Thomas, 1645-1699.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by S. Roycroft for Robert Clavell, and are to be sold by Richard Lambert,
